user.title: CozyLife Local Setup
user.description: Configure the CozyLife Local integration. Devices are automatically discovered via UDP broadcast and hostname scanning. You can optionally specify additional IP addresses manually.

data_description.ips: Enter IP addresses of devices that may not be discovered automatically, separated by commas. Leave empty to use automatic discovery only.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance of CozyLife Local is allowed.
